gov.medicaid.controllers.admin

Class SystemAdminUserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.medicaid.controllers.admin.BaseSystemAdminController
      • gov.medicaid.controllers.admin.SystemAdminUserController

  • @RequestMapping(value="/system/user/*")
public class SystemAdminUserController
extends BaseSystemAdminController
    This controller class that manages users, all 4 types of them. Changes in 1.1: update search to add initSearchBox parameter.

    Thread Safety This class is mutable and not thread safe, but used in thread safe manner by framework.

    Since:
    1.0
    Endpoint:
    "/system/user/*"

      • search

        @RequestMapping(value="/search")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView search(@RequestParam(value="role")
                                                                                            java.lang.String role,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="initSearchBox",required=false,defaultValue="false")
                                                                                            boolean initSearchBox,
                                                                                            gov.medicaid.entities.UserSearchCriteria criteria)
                                                                                     throws gov.medicaid.services.PortalServiceException
        This action will search for users. Changes in 1.1: add initSearchBox parameter.
        Parameters:
        role - - the role being managed
        initSearchBox - - the initialize search box flag
        criteria - - the search criteria
        Returns:
        - the model and view instance that contains the name of view to be rendered and data to be used for rendering (not null)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if role is not one of the four configured roles, or if the criteria is null
        gov.medicaid.services.PortalServiceException - - If there are any errors in the action
        Endpoint:
        "/system/user/search"

public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView create(@RequestParam(value="roleName")
